itemList.itemDescription: Barcelona stands out for its great variety of restaurants: Italian, Indian, Mediterranean food, author, fast-food, slow-food, hamburgers, tapas, vegan food or Argentinian barbecues ... everything has a place in Barcelona. But without a doubt, one of the dishes that you always want is a good pizza. These are our recommendations:
